concept.title: Delivery Addresses
concept.shortdesc: U Market Services strives to ensure that all packages are delivered to their correct destinations.

conbody.p: To help us deliver to the correct destination, be sure that your delivery address is correct by creating a PLocation Code for EACH LOCATION you plan to send orders to.
Your PLocation Code is the unique number stored in EFS and with the U Market supplier. It references your shipping address in a specific format.
If you have any questions, please contact U Market Customer Support at 612-624-4878 or umarket@umn.edu.
